name: connector
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device or part of a device that makes it possible to connect one piece of electrical equipment to another by allowing contact between wires, electrical components (= parts), etc. : This charger doesn't have the right connector for my phone. USB connectors are sometimes referred to as "male" connectors, plugging into a "female" port. This easy-to-set-up external device connects to the monitor connector of a computer.
an object that connects two pipes, tubes, etc. so that something such as water or gas can flow from one to the other: We sell connectors for outdoor taps and hosepipes. Water pipes are linked to the basin by 15mm connectors. See also
elbow connector
More examplesFewer examplesEach component has a standardized connector that allows any compatibile device to be used with it.The computer's connectors included a parallel port interface, two serial ports and a keyboard connector. Make sure that the connectors on the cable ends are compatible with the connectors on the hardware.Check that the plug is in the connector correctly.This is a standard type of optical connector.Use a branch connector for joining pipes from different outlets to a single downpipe.
